core:processNote.core:description:
This process fails silently if the endpoint is not configured or some other error happens. This is to not interrupt the flow of the return process.
If the return is being cancelled and there is nothing in the basket other than the looked up postcode, then remove it from the basket.
If an authorising user was required to sign on, and did sign on, then display the message again.

core:action.core:comment: Test config change available (set by config monitor process)
